00054 namespace {
00055   const char *usage[] = {
00056     "usage: Hypertable.RangeServer [OPTIONS]",
00057     "",
00058     "OPTIONS:",
00059     "  --config=<file>      Read configuration from <file>.  The default config file is",
00060     "                       \"conf/hypertable.cfg\" relative to the toplevel install directory",
00061     "  --help               Display this help text and exit",
00062     "  --log-broker=<addr>  Use the DFS broker located at <addr> for the commit log.",
00063     "                       <addr> is of the format <host>:<port>",
00064     "  --pidfile=<fname>    Write the process ID to <fname> upon successful startup",
00065     "  --verbose,-v         Generate verbose output",
00066     ""
00067     "This program is the Hypertable range server.",
00068     (const char *)0
00069   };
00070   const int DEFAULT_WORKERS = 20;
00071 }
00072 
00073 
00077 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00078   {
00079     ConnectionManagerPtr conn_manager_ptr;
00080     ApplicationQueuePtr app_queue_ptr;
00081     CommPtr comm_ptr;
00082     string configFile = "";
00083     string pidFile = "";
00084     int reactorCount;
00085     char *logBroker = 0;
00086     PropertiesPtr props_ptr;
00087     int workerCount;
00088     TimerHandlerPtr timer_handler_ptr;
00089 
00090     System::initialize(argv[0]);
00091     Global::verbose = false;
00092   
00093     if (argc > 1) {
00094       for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00095         if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--config=", 9))
00096           configFile = &argv[i][9];
00097         else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--log-broker=", 13))
00098           logBroker = &argv[i][13];
00099         else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--pidfile=", 10))
00100           pidFile = &argv[i][10];
00101         else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--verbose") || !strcmp(argv[i], "-v"))
00102           Global::verbose = true;
00103         else
00104           Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00105       }
00106     }
00107 
00111     srand((unsigned)getpid());
00112 
00113     if (configFile == "")
00114       configFile = System::installDir + "/conf/hypertable.cfg";
00115 
00116     props_ptr = new Properties(configFile);
00117     if (Global::verbose)
00118       props_ptr->set("Hypertable.Verbose", "true");
00119 
00120     if (logBroker != 0) {
00121       char *portStr = strchr(logBroker, ':');
00122       if (portStr == 0) {
00123         HT_ERROR("Invalid address format for --log-broker, must be <host>:<port>");
00124         exit(1);
00125       }
00126       *portStr++ = 0;
00127       props_ptr->set("Hypertable.RangeServer.CommitLog.DfsBroker.Host", logBroker);
00128       props_ptr->set("Hypertable.RangeServer.CommitLog.DfsBroker.Port", portStr);
00129     }
00130 
00131     reactorCount = props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.RangeServer.Reactors", System::get_processor_count());
00132     ReactorFactory::initialize(reactorCount);
00133     comm_ptr = new Comm();
00134 
00135     workerCount = props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.RangeServer.Workers", DEFAULT_WORKERS);
00136 
00137     conn_manager_ptr = new ConnectionManager(comm_ptr.get());
00138     app_queue_ptr = new ApplicationQueue(workerCount);
00139 
00143     Global::hyperspace_ptr = new Hyperspace::Session(comm_ptr.get(), props_ptr, new HyperspaceSessionHandler());
00144     if (!Global::hyperspace_ptr->wait_for_connection(30)) {
00145       HT_ERROR("Unable to connect to hyperspace, exiting...");
00146       exit(1);
00147     }
00148 
00149     Global::range_metadata_max_bytes = props_ptr->get_int64("Hypertable.RangeServer.Range.MetadataMaxBytes", 0LL);
00150 
00151     if (Global::verbose) {
00152       cout << "CPU count = " << System::get_processor_count() << endl;
00153       cout << "Hypertable.RangeServer.Reactors=" << reactorCount << endl;
00154       if (Global::range_metadata_max_bytes != 0)
00155         cout << "Hypertable.RangeServer.Range.MetadataMaxBytes=" << Global::range_metadata_max_bytes << endl;
00156     }
00157 
00158     RangeServerPtr range_server_ptr = new RangeServer(props_ptr, conn_manager_ptr, app_queue_ptr, Global::hyperspace_ptr);
00159 
00160     if (pidFile != "") {
00161       fstream filestr (pidFile.c_str(), fstream::out);
00162       filestr << getpid() << endl;
00163       filestr.close();
00164     }
00165 
00166     // install maintenance timer
00167     timer_handler_ptr = new TimerHandler(comm_ptr.get(), range_server_ptr.get());
00168 
00169     app_queue_ptr->join();
00170 
00171     Global::metadata_table_ptr = 0;
00172 
00173     ReactorFactory::destroy();
00174 
00175     HT_ERROR("Exiting RangeServer.");
00176 
00177   }
00178   exit(1);
00179 }
